bug.short_desc: Image copied from TB message does not paste into new message

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729) Build Identifier: 3.1.9
1. Copy an image from a TB message 2. Open new message 3. Paste into new message
Puts up an outline for the pasted image, with no image, sometimes has a line of text. Doing Paste Without Formatting gives a long path to the file, usually as an attachment.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: See Details.
Actual Results: See details
Expected Results: Copied image does not paste into new message.
Should paste the image rather than an empty image frame with nothing or weird text inside.
Note that if the image copied from a Thunderbird message is first pasted into another app (such as FotoFinish, probably PhotoShop), then copied from that app, it pastes into a new Thunderbird message as expected.
It has been reported that this problem began after the 3pr3 release. Worked as expected in version 2 and 3pre.
